I. The crown of righteousness ... -- II. The influence of God upon getting wealth -- III. The small influence that abundance hath ... -- IV. The nature of that testimony, which Christians are bound to give ... -- V. The nature of persecution for righteousness sake ... -- VI. The riddle of a persecuted believers life -- VII. How persecutions turneth to believers ...
